Huh no wonder I find this really grating. Didn't realise this was the prequel to Drive Your Nightmare. That was one of the few times where I just get uncontrollably angry over an NTR story and I've fapped to a lot of other NTRs. I despise anyone who'd even THINK about doing this to their friends. Don't be a scumbag friend -_-

Heh, to think a flamewar over a single translated chapter of this would have happened. By the way, i'l say this important public ad again, this comic has already been finished ages ago and is actually a prelude/post history to "Drive your nightmare" by this author

Another one about a retarded girl that would rather become a playboy's fuckbuddy than confess to the guy she loves... I guess at the end of Ch 2 she's right, she's not a good match for him. Nobody needs to be dating a 2c slut that sleeps with the guy's best friend behind his back. The ending hasn't been TL'd but looks.... interesting? I think that's a first *ever* I've said about an NTR story.
Oh well, that "to be continue" frightens me, FUCK!!!
